snippet.title: Triple Chocolate Almond Biscotti
snippet.description: You'll get extra satisfaction with this unique Triple Chocolate Almond Biscotti recipe that has crunchy almonds topped with a decadent chocolate drizzle. Great with coffee!

snippet.title: Chocolate-Peanut Butter Mud Pie
snippet.description: This easy mud pie is filled with every kid's favorite flavors: peanut butter, chocolate and graham crackers. It takes only a few minutes to assemble, and the raves will be worth the wait!
